original_text: If a ransom is imposed on him, then he shall give for the redemption of his life whatever is imposed on him.
korean_text: 만일 그에게 속죄금을 부과하면 무릇 그 명령한 것을 생명의 대가로 낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: If a ransom is imposed on him,
he shall give whatever is imposed on him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기에게 부과된 것은 무엇이든지 주어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: for the redemption of his life.
